brief_title: Aripiprazole in Patients With Acute Mania
brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to test the safety & efficacy of aripiprazole in patients with Bipolar Mania for a period of at least 12 weeks.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Primary diagnosis of Acute Bipolar I Mania Exclusion Criteria: - Patients with a DSM-IV diagnosis other than Bipolar I Mania
